@@ -14,6 +14,11 @@ The following information describes how to upgrade your API Manager server **fro
 
 Follow the instructions below to upgrade your WSO2 API Manager server **from WSO2 API-M 2.0.0 to 3.1.0**.
 
+!!! note "If you are using PostgreSQL"
+    The DB user need to have superuser role to run the migration client and the relevant scripts

timeline.author: rmsamitha
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2215,10 +2220,10 @@ Follow the instructions below to move all the existing API Manager configuration
         [indexing]
         re_indexing= 1
         ```
-
+        
         !!! info 
-            If you use a clustered/distributed API Manager setup, change the file in the API Publisher node. For example, change the `/_system/local/repository/components/org.wso2.carbon.registry/indexing/lastaccesstime` registry path to `/_system/local/repository/components/org.wso2.carbon.registry/indexing/lastaccesstime_1`
-
+            If you use a clustered/distributed API Manager setup, do the above change in deployment.toml of Publisher and Devportal
